comments.text:
Bug 629734 introduced a whole set of 'todo_check' functions into xpcshell, but they're totally undocumented.  Please add comments in head.js, and also add the functions to the list at

   https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Writing_xpcshell-based_unit_tests

Assigning to khuey since he wrote the code.
comments.author: jduell.mcbugs@gmail.com
comments.creator: jduell.mcbugs@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Bug 629734 introduced a whole set of 'todo_check' functions into xpcshell, but they're totally undocumented.  Please add comments in head.js, and also add the functions to the list at

   https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Writing_xpcshell-based_unit_tests

Assigning to khuey since he wrote the code.
